page.title: 05Entertainment
page.content: As there is no community hall in the area, the only entertainment is to be found in the local Inn, which has music on one evening each week. The Inn is a clearing house for all local gossip, news and farming talk. The meeting place is in the adjoining block it is the local Village Hall, it is widely used by members living in this block. There is a Gardening Club, Scouts and Guides, Women's Institute and many other groups using the hall for money raising events such as Coffee Evenings, Garden Shows, Autumn and Summer Fairs and Dances. The owners of Sugnall Hall also allow generous use of their home for entertainment of this kind for the benefit of the local communities. There is a Riding School which offers facilities for riding, riding instruction and ensures good use of the Bridleways.
